parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required to be in timestamp format in seconds.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The base-64 JWT token. Using to identify each permission to the API with the callback service

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for authorization.

parameters.name: merchant
parameters.description: Specify which states if for error. Every if no error happened

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the starting point of data to return in this current call. Default is 0. Max allowed is offset last size return

parameters.name: warning
parameters.description: Indicate which states if for error. Error if no error happened

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error handling

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate which states if for error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate which states if warning. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error handling

response_fields.name: has_next_page
response_fields.description: This is to indicate whether the data has more data from the API. If true means still has data for next page. If false means have fetch all the data
